events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to return the product and get a full refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The customer has requested a return and refund for their recent purchase, noting dissatisfaction with the product.
Assigning case to the returns department to handle the refund request as per customer instructions.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your order and request a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product is not what I expected and I would prefer to return it for a full refund.
We have approved your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to ship the product back to us.
Thank you for the quick response. I have received the return label and will send back the product today.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case now.
